Create a file `~/.slackr` _(`file.create("~/.slackr")`)_

```{yaml}
token: ... 
channel: #random
username: vincent
incoming_webhook_url:https://YOUR.slack.com/services/hooks/incoming-webhook?
```

Init `slackr`
```{r eval=FALSE}
library(slack)
slackr::slackr_setup()
Sys.setenv("SLACK_API_TOKEN"= 'xoxb-xxx')
```

```{r eval=FALSE}
create_slack_channel(channel  = "trouvemoi10")
```

```{r eval=FALSE}

invite_users_to_channel(users = c("vincent","diane"), channel = "trouvemoi11") 
```


```{r eval=FALSE}
set_channel_topic(topic = "yeeepieee",channel = "trouvemoi11")
```
